section_text: 1 In section 60 of the  New Towns Act 1981 (limit on borrowing by development corporations and Commission for New Towns) for “£3,625 million or such greater sum not exceeding £4,000 million” there shall be substituted  “            £4,500 million or such greater sum not exceeding £5,000 million          ” .
2 1 This Act may be cited as the New Towns Act 1982. 2 This Act does not extend to Northern Ireland.
